name: @valcome/ng-screens
description: A collection of handy services regarding screen orientation, screen size and fullscreen mode.

scripts.postversion: git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade npm version" && git push
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && cd ../../dist/ng-screens && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && cd ../../dist/ng-screens && npm publish

author: Valcome Analytics
